system.description: Not every dog is the perfect friend, but yours is (when your dog dies you lose this talent but can take it again at half price when you get a new dog).
system.basicAction: Your dog can help you track, giving you a +1 bonus to HAWKEYE when tracking.
system.advAction: Your loyal friend can help you when you are Broken. Once per session your dog’s presence is comforting and immediately restores 1D3 to the Broken attribute.
